thread.title: Zambia: One Dollar Now Above K11, 000
thread.title_full: Zambia: One Dollar Now Above K11, 000

title: Zambia: One Dollar Now Above K11, 000
text:
Kenya: Central Bank Set to Release Details of New Look Currency Next Week 
It's not even news any more but PF madness, however, the Zambian Kwacha continued tumbling uninterrupted today. 
In most bureaux de changes, one Dollar is selling close to K11: 30 while the British Pound is fetching K17:00 
In Commercial Banks, the Dollar has just but crossed the K11:00 mark. In FNB Zambia, one Dollar today was selling at K10.92. One Euro K11.96, a single Pound K16.6. 
At Zanaco, a Dollar was going for K10.90. But the Euro crossed over K12:00 and was selling at K12.1723. Zambia
